20101209080942.429|20101209081301.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101209080942.429|20101209080943.857|CCO|       COPD makes it hard
20101209080943.857|20101209080945.286|CCO|       for me to breathe.
20101209080945.286|20101209080946.714|CCO|        But with ADVAIR,
20101209080946.714|20101209080948.143|CCO|      I'm breathing better.
20101209080948.143|20101209080949.571|CCO| So now, I can join the fun and
20101209080949.571|20101209080951.000|CCO|  games with my grandchildren.
20101209080951.000|20101209080952.429|CCO|           Great news!
20101209080952.429|20101209080953.857|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101209080953.857|20101209080955.286|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101209080955.286|20101209080956.714|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101209080956.714|20101209080958.143|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101209080958.143|20101209080959.571|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101209080959.571|20101209081001.000|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101209081001.000|20101209081002.250|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101209081002.250|20101209081003.500|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101209081003.500|20101209081004.750|CCO|       because it contains
20101209081004.750|20101209081006.000|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101209081006.000|20101209081007.250|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101209081007.250|20101209081008.500|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101209081008.500|20101209081009.750|CCO|        working together
20101209081009.750|20101209081011.000|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101209081011.000|20101209081012.429|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101209081012.429|20101209081013.857|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101209081013.857|20101209081015.286|CCO|        and should not be
20101209081015.286|20101209081016.714|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101209081016.714|20101209081018.143|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101209081018.143|20101209081019.571|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101209081019.571|20101209081021.000|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101209081021.000|20101209081022.111|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101209081022.111|20101209081023.222|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101209081023.222|20101209081024.333|CCO|     and some eye problems.
20101209081024.333|20101209081025.444|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101209081025.444|20101209081026.556|CCO|  if you have a heart condition
20101209081026.556|20101209081027.667|CCO|     or high blood pressure
20101209081027.667|20101209081028.778|CCO|      before taking ADVAIR.
20101209081028.778|20101209081029.889|CCO|    I had fun today, Grandpa.
